GSD.description:
ref_tracker: implement use-after-free detection

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.3 by commit 3743c9de303fa36c2e2ca2522ab280c52bcafbd2. For more details please see the references link.
